name: Sport Evolution
overview:
Sport Evolution is a professional polish sports marketing agency providing wide range of services for business, sport clubs and organizations, athletes and organizers of sport events.

Our passion for sport together with a thorow management and marketing evidence guarantee the highest level of our services. That is why we have managed to gain a considerable group of clients since we established Sport Evolution in 2007. We have worked for both international brands (e.g. Reebok, adidas, Herbalife, Timex, Powerade, Decathlon, Asics, Accenture, Carrefour) and polish companies such as: PGNiG SA, Action SA, Polkomtel SA or Bank BPS.

Our core services are: sports marketing & PR, event organization and sponsoring. We will be honored to help you achieve your goals on the polish market.

Please visit our official website to find out more: http://www.sportevolution.pl
